results.abstract: A $1.2 billion investment by Masayoshi Son’s conglomerate, SoftBank, is the first step in his promise made in a meeting with Mr. Trump to create thousands of jobs in the United States.

results.title: Russian Cyberforgers Steal Millions a Day With Fake Sites

media.copyright: Kevin Hagen for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Online Advertising;News and News Media;Frauds and Swindling;Russia
results.abstract: A criminal ring is diverting as much as $5 million in advertising revenue a day in a scheme to show video ads to phantom internet users.

results.title: A Master Work, the Ghent Altarpiece, Reawakens Stroke by Stroke

media.copyright: Hugo Maertens, Lukas-Art in Flanders/St. Bavo Cathedral

results.adx_keywords: Restoration and Renovation;Ghent (Belgium);Art;van Eyck, Jan;van Eyck, Hubert;University of Antwerp;University of Ghent;Ghent Altarpiece;Renaissance
results.abstract: Restorers painstakingly removed varnish and overpainting from a 15th-century work, after new scanning technology revealed that what lay below was stunning.
